bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zou ma ya gan 走馬牙疳 , running horse dental gan -illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 quoting Quan you xin jian 全幼心鑒 : 走馬牙疳 , “Running horse dental gan -illness”, writes: 走馬急疳 , “ Running horse acute gan -illness ”. Zou ma ya gan 走馬牙疳 , running horse dental gan -illness [19]

Abbreviated Designation zou ma gan 走 馬疳 , running horse gan- illness; Alternative Names zou ma ji gan 走馬急疳 , running horse acute gan -illness. Pathological Condition of ya gan 牙疳 , dental gan -illness, that develops abruptly and turns into a serious condition, with festering decay beginning at the teeth and gums and eventually causing the teeth to erode and fall out. It passes through four stages: peng sha 崩砂 , collapsing sand; kui cao 潰槽 , bursting trough; xuan lu 宣露 , exposure; fu gen 腐根 , rotten root. XEWSZWLF 20: 治小兒走馬牙 疳 , “To cure running horse dental gan -illness in children”.
